title: Digital Marketing
body: The course is hugely interactive with projects, checklists & actionable lectures built into every section. title: Video Graphy/Content Creating
body: This course is a Video Editing made easy and Graphic designing, all with your Smartphone. It has a step by step guide to creating amazing videos either for business or personal use.  Visual content is very important in our world today and this course will help you to be able to create visual engaging contents that stand out. You need this course because Video and Graphics is for everyone. Enroll now lets learn a lot of things you can do with your Smartphone - (Both iOS and Android)
